sections.heading: to require demonstration of exemption
sections.text: The director may require that any person claiming to be exempt from licensing under the Nebraska Money Transmitters Act pursuant to section 8-2703 provide information and documentation to the director demonstrating that such person qualifies for exemption.Source

8-2704.Authority to require demonstration of exemption.

The director may require that any person claiming to be exempt from licensing under the Nebraska Money Transmitters Act pursuant to section 8-2703 provide information and documentation to the director demonstrating that such person qualifies for exemption.

SourceLaws 2013, LB616, ยง 4;Laws 2025, LB474, ยง 9.Operative Date: October 1, 2025
